Name: SnowDollKoopa
Notes: A large snow statue of Bowser that can be destroyed with by hitting it twice with various player attacks, such as snowballs and fireballs. It may spawn a Power Star if the object and Scenario entry are configured correctly.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Snowballs
Obj_arg0.Description: The number of snowballs that will appear when destroying it.

Obj_arg2.Name: Play Riddle SFX?
Obj_arg2.Description: If enabled, it will play the "riddle solved" jingle when destroyed.

Obj_arg3.Name: Power Star ID
Obj_arg3.Description: The scenario ID of the Power Star to be spawned. -1 does not register a Power Star.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.
